diff_act: 3.allow to configure device rules using an additional login password for security purposes

regen.absent_element: validation of changes before they are applied to the devices or workstations
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate all changes made through the GUI configuration screen before applying them to the affected devices, controllers, or workstations in the RLCS network.

regen.absent_element: saving or confirming changes to the configuration
regen.new_specification: The system shall save and confirm all changes made to the configuration, including device rules and facility map modifications, after a successful login with an additional password.

regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation of successful configuration changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or confirm to the operator when configuration changes have been successfully applied.

label: The option to configure device rules shall require an additional login password for that option.
absence: an additional login password for configuring device rules
